shattered into obsidian pieces you once so carefully fused together.<br2/>Ring of Ender is designed exactly to solve this issue, allowing you to tear the fabric of space and access contents of your ender chest with nothing but sheer force of will.<br2/>Just don't forget to pull your hand out of when you release the rift.
book.anticlimacticlagacy.entry.arcane_sc: Creation of arcane scrolls, besides writing materials and mundane blank scroll, will usually take a couple arcane ingredients, to make sure that the scroll you create does something more than just exist. They can be carried around like any other accessories.<br2/>These are unlikely contribute as much to your image of terrifying, mighty mage,

especially given that books were invented a long time ago by now. Yet that matters not given how vast are practical possibilities they may provide, if designed and put together masterfully.<br2/>Weirdly, it's difficult to come by a scroll used for just storing writings, even among the most ancient samples of literature.<br2/>Perhaps, it's not such an obvious design after all?..
Here is outlined the way to craft an empty scroll.<br2/>Might not be extremely useful on its own, but it serves as a base for creation of arcane scrolls.
book.anticlimacticlagacy.entry.darkest_s: Found withing the treasures of dangerous Bastions, those rolls of black-stained pergament draw little suspicion at first glance. Yet in truth they are infused with some unknown sort of dark magic, one that seems strangely familiar to one that empowers Ring of the Seven Curses.<br2/>That magic however lays dormant within its vessel,
a raw, slumbering energy seemingly waiting to be awoken and exploited. Perhaps the Darkest Scroll could serve as base for creation of new, more powerful arcane scrolls?
book.anticlimacticlagacy.entry.avarice_s:
One another relic harnessing the boundless strength of the Seven Curses, this elegant scroll is designed to fulfill the boundless inner greed you so carefully conceal within your soul.
Its primary effect is an ability to confuse minds of the creatures you trade or barter with, into misguessing true price and benefit of the deal... much in your favor.

Piglins seem to be most affected by this ability, with their helpless affection by gold. Not only this allows the scroll to overcome the effect of the Second Curse and render them neutral in your regard, as they normally are

towards anyone who bears enough golden equipment on them, but it also makes bartering with those creatures about twice as beneficial on average, allowing you to get anywhere from normal item quantity to three times the quantity in exchange from any single barter.<br2/>Villagers are also affected by this scroll's ability, even though not as much as Piglins are - stable 35<percent/> discount on every trade is about as much

as you can get from their little avid person.<br2/>Apart from this, you also get a slight chance of having an entire Emerald materialize into existance right from within your avaricious dreams whenever you happen to slay any living creature, and <&l>+1 Fortune Level<clear/> which will doubtlessly help you get your hands on some more riches anytime you feel like descending into the mines.
Just don't let that greed of yours take over your mind, and you'll be fine.
book.anticlimacticlagacy.entry.infinimea: One another way to harness the power that rests within Heart of the Earth, this arcane substance embodies the power of nature itself, with its everlasting desire to spread its roots across the earth, to grow and thrive no matter what.<br2/>Letting it come in contact with most forms of plantlife is enough to significantly

accellerate their growth, similar to the effect produced when using Bone Meal. Unlike Bone Meal, however, you only need a mere grains of it to achieve such effect. Left alone, it seems to be able to draw power from surrounding

nature, growing and replenishing itself in quantity after being used - though never to more than there was created originally.<br2/>It also works on certain plants that normal fertilizers have no effect on, specifically Sugar Cane, Cactuses, Vines and Nether Wart.
book.anticlimacticlagacy.entry.cosmic_sc: The might of this rumor-shadowed scroll is denied to most demigods, even those who have approached the godship rather close. Who is permitted to possess it is at the discretion of The Fool himself, and as rumors would have it - the journey to $(l:https://discord.gg/fuWK8ns)his domain$(/l) is long and full of dangers, and to be noticed by that godly being is an honor few of its dwellers ever had.
Those who did, however, are awarded with power which has no equal; for the world to bask in their glory, and for them to spread the faith to the ears and eyes of others.
book.anticlimacticlagacy.entry.cosmic_he: With a fine selection of arcane ingredients, those which contain the power of other dimensions, you can alter the earthly nature of Heart of the Sea, transforming it into something different... Vastly more powerful.<br2/>The power of cosmos itself now rests at the palm of your hand. Only time will tell what unimaginable feats can be
achieved with it, what fabulous artifacts can be powered with its reality-bending energies.<br2/>But one thing is for certain - the world will tremble beneath the steps of their bearer.
book.anticlimacticlagacy.entry.abyssal_h: When this unearthly abomination fell into your hands for the first time, description-defying mix of feelings have overcome your mind, among which there was a place for terror and excitement, admiration and disgust. The gaze of its lonely eye befell you with intent impossible to comprehend, but once initial wave of emotions retreated - you have

concluded that it poses no threat to you.<br2/>Still, you know not what it truly is, and where it came from. Perhaps your insufferable existence, and efforts to live in spite of Seven Curses were noticed by some unnameable eldritch power, and through your

damnable being it have chosen to channel itself into the world. Perhaps it is a mere accident, a fluke in reality itself that allowed something like this to appear. Perhaps it is your ailing mind that have conceived this horror in some nightmarish fever, and with its growth - corruption of the curses have managed to manifest it into the mortal realm?<br2/>Perhaps it's best to never know, for some truths are much

more unsettling than anything a man's imagination can come up with.<br2/>Regardless, now you are the rightful owner of this thing. And it will not be long before you can put it to some unimaginably violent, frightening use... The world will suffer tenfold for all the suffering it caused to you.
book.anticlimacticlagacy.entry.astral_fr: Though many have sought this relic, it appears that you are among the few who found. In fact, it was not even that hard at all. Though a journey itself was nothing short of a feat, once you have made your way to the End City and opened the first treasure chest - there it was, awaiting you.<br2/>It certainly has connection to Seven Curses, but you cannot

begin to imagine how circumstances aligned in such a way that it was in that exact chest you have opened, and no other. Determinism was never among your favored beliefs, and yet... perhaps it was destiny?<br2/>At any rate, the taste is divine, and the ability it has
to empower you to bear another ring is undeniably useful.
book.anticlimacticlagacy.entry.curse_of_: The similarity of this curse's name to Curse of Binding is no accident - for it does exactly the same thing as the latter, preventing you from removing armor and accessories from yourself once equipped. The twist, however, is in the fact that items bearing this one will persist with you even across death. This might be less severe in the case of armor, since sooner or later

it will break; for most accessories, however, with this curse applied you condemn yourself to bear them until you die permanently or until the end of time, whichever comes first.<br2/>Unlike most other curses, the only way to obtain this one seems to be by using classical
Enchanting Table, empowered by the Enchanter's Pearl.

Applicable only to armor, this curse adds an aftermath to the damage you would take from your enemies. Severe debuffs will befall you for every hit that you take, the greater the damage - the greater the debuffs.<br2/>Hopefully, the chance of such happening is only about one in ten for every piece of armor with this curse that you bear.

As per usual, you can occasionally find items bearing this curse among ancient treasures which you periodically pillage. It might be useful to power Scroll of a Thousand Curses if you have such, but whether or not the tradeoff is worth it is for you to judge.
Enchanting Table, empowered by the Enchanter's Pearl.
book.anticlimacticlagacy.entry.the_infin: It is conceived. In union with this dark, flesh-covered book, with horror that its pages conceal, you will wreak havoc upon those who threatened you.<br2/>Upon those who laughed at you, those who underestimated you, those who undertaken every effort to break you, to cleanse the world of your presence, be they disgusted by corruption that you bear or simply

viewing you as an easy prey. For you are the writings that cannot be burned, knowledge that cannot be forgotten, truth that cannot be denied.<br2/>You will reveal to this realm what it have so persistently
attempted to unmake and erase, you will engrave upon the tablets of eternity that reality which it have tried to hide.<br2/>You will teach them all a lesson they shall never forget.
book.anticlimacticlagacy.entry.ender_sla: One of the toughest lessons you have learned ever since first equipping Ring of the Seven Curses is that Endermen are no longer able to tolerate your existence. They have haunted you ever since - screeching, frightening horrors, chasing you in the night under the stars, and in smothering darkness of twisted salt-soaked caverns beneath the ground, possessed by

unbendable desire to decimate your being. Before long, you have accepted that to restore neutral relations with them is by all means an impossible undertaking, and abandoned any and every attempt to achieve such.

If that was the end of it - perhaps, to submit yourself to such fate and perpetually suffer their nightmarish onslaught would become nothing more than another part of your routine, and you would bear it with acceptance you have achieved in bearing all other curses.<br2/>If only... Now that The End beckons you to meet its challenges, traverse its lands and claim its treasures, the Endermen have become an

obstacle in your way equal to which you did not face yet. For that dimension is inhabited fully by their kind, and thus, to even survive entering it seems a feat beyond the limits of your power as a demigod.<br2/>Perhaps, it is time to recede, to finally abandon your hope of surmounting this world's challanges and harnessing corruption of the curses. But the battle may yet be won. With this sword, and your sheer strength of will you may yet
stand victorious. For if peace cannot be made... it can only mean war.
book.anticlimacticlagacy.landing_text: In front of you lies the well of great knowledge, a place where some of this world's greatest mysteries belong, scrupulously researched and carefully catalogized.<br2/>As your journey continues and the world reveals itself to you, you may revisit and behold knowledge you gathered within these pages.
